refnamediv.refpurpose: This application is used convert OD-matrices (stored in Vissim format) into single trip definitions. No routing takes place, yet.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: od2trips obtains a network generated from a Vissim or a Visum-network and a set of od-files stored in Vissim/Visum format. This information is used to generate single vehicle trips by dividing the od-matrix into the amounts of vehicles with a certain origin and destination and writing each of such vehicle trip information into the named output file.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: In the following, all possible options are presented.

Please remark, that the configuration-option may be used to supply a file that contains all other parameter's definition. Please take a look into the SUMO user documentation for further information about the usage of configuration files.

listitem.para: Specifies whether and which a configuration file shall be loaded. Optional, type:filename, default: none
The SUMO-network file to use. Mandatory, type:filename, default: none
The file containing a single O/D-matrix. Optional, type:filename, default: none
Defines the name of the file to write the computed trips into. Mandatory, type:filename, default: none
A scaling value the O/D-matrix is scaled with. This value is not depending on values stored within the matrix. Optional (pre-given), type:float, default: 1
A virtual time to specify the begin of route computation. Previous routes are skipped. Optional (pre-given), type:int, default: 0
A virtual time to specify the end of route computation. Later routes are skipped. Optional (pre-given), type:int, default: 86400
Prints some information about the process during execution. Optional, type:bool, default: false
No warnings will be prompted if this option is set. Optional, type:bool, default: false
Prints the current option settings before the execution starts. Optional, type:bool, default: false
All outputs (messages, warnings, and errors) will be written to the named file. Optional, type:filename, default: none
Initialises the random number generator with the current time (in ms) in the hope to make him generate really random numbers of an unknown order. Optional, type:bool, default: false
Initialises the random number generator with the given value. Optional, type:int, default: none

refsect1.title: USAGE
refsect1.para: The following topics should be described more precisely within the SUMO user documentation that may be found at http://sumo.sourceforge.net

refsect2.title: Examples
refsect2.para: Does the things described by the configuration "myConfig.netc.cfg"

refsect1.title: CAVEATS
refsect1.para: The program is still under development.

refsect1.title: BUGS
refsect1.para: The program is still under development.
